meanings.sent1: The team had a consultative meeting to discuss the project.
meanings.sent2: She prefers a consultative approach when making decisions.
meanings.sent3: The consultative process helped them reach a mutual agreement.
meanings.sent4: His consultative style of leadership brought unity to the group.
meanings.sent5: The consultative nature of the discussion made everyone feel heard.

meanings.definition: Providing advice or guidance through discussion.
meanings.sent1: The consultative counselor helped her work through her problems.
meanings.sent2: Their consultative services have been invaluable to many clients.
meanings.sent3: The consultative session was both enlightening and comforting.
meanings.sent4: She appreciated his consultative approach to mentoring.
meanings.sent5: The consultative guidance led them to a successful outcome.

meanings.sent1: The consultative process allowed for input from all team members.
meanings.sent2: Their decision-making was consultative rather than authoritative.
meanings.sent3: The consultative approach ensured everyone's voice was heard.
meanings.sent4: The consultative nature of the agreement made it fair to all parties.
meanings.sent5: Their consultative strategy led to a well-rounded solution.
